title: Deus Ex - Invisible War [PC game] image
description:
Deus Ex: Invisible War.
***********************
Eidos Interactive,
Ion Storm,
Sci-Fi Action Adventure,
Release: 2003.
Game type: First person shooter.

REQUIREMENTS.
*************
98/2000/XP.
1.5GHZ CPU INTEL PENTIUM.
256 RAM.
2GB HARD DISK FREE SPACE.

Copied DVD-ROM as an image [MDF/MDS].

Delivered in rar folder containing 1 image file and 1 text document with instructions.

Extract the 2 files from the rar folder and mount the image using a virtual machine, I recommend to use Daemon Tools, I've added a link in the text document to download Daemon Tools.

If you havent got an extractor installed download one from the link provided, I recommend to use 7Zip.

Once 7Zip is install, simply right click on the downloaded rar folder > 7Zip > extract here.
 <a href="
http://www.filehippo.com/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.filehippo.com/</a>
